name: Shared Prey
summary: Hunting as a duo, you and your ally both single out your prey.
description:
Hunting as a duo, you and your ally both single out your prey. When you use Hunt Prey and select only one prey, you can grant your Hunt Prey benefits and hunterâ€™s edge to an ally in addition to gaining them yourself. The ally retains these benefits until you use Hunt Prey again.Shared Prey Leads To...

Triple Threat
